texts.name: Wife
texts.text: Honey, I think I want a divorce...

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: My ex just arrived at the front door...

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: Where are you, did you forget our anniversary?

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: Your PC is on fire again, please come fix it.

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: There's a tornado in the distance, check out this pic

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: Why is there a man with a tail outside our house?

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: I made your favorite dinner honey! Pizza Lunchables and dino nuggies!

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: I'm going to watch Breaking Bad without you

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: This lady claiming to be your ex-gf is here

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: Honey what is this folder on your computer labeled 'homework'?

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: I want to try that League of Legends game, gonna play on your account

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: Why do you always ignore my texts?

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: Ok I def want a divorce now >:(

texts.name: Wife
texts.text: Your parents are here, and they brought dino nuggies!!!
